author: James R. Lamb "Jim Lamb"

review: This is the first "TV" device we've had, so I wasn't sure what to expect. I purchased the Fire TV console because I understood it would download programs prior to playback for a better streaming experience. Our television, which runs off our WIFI, is in a part of the house that doesn't always get a good signal and tends to stop playing because of it. It got so bad that the television just sat for a couple of months because we were so frustrated by the poor playback. I was hoping the Fire TV would work despite the varying connection strength. We've only had the unit for a few days, but in that time we've watched four full-length movies without interruption, so it seems to be meeting our expectations. I'm glad O bought it.
author: mtflyfish

review: So far i like the Fire TV. Only issue I've had was purchasing a season of a TV series on my computer and I wasn't able to view it on the fire TV maybe I didn't wait long enough for it to show up... wasn't sure about this. it seems like all my other purchases were there but i went ahead and bought it from the Fire TV as well and watched the episodes from there. Most likely this is where I will purchase my episodes and movies so it shouldnt be a big  deal. Also i haven't noticed a way to setup a kids profile... again may be my lack of experience with it so far (I've only used it for a few days) but having a kids profile to let my kids loose on it would be nice.
